full_output.summary: B.Tech Student in Computer Science and Engineering at SRMUniversity,Andhra Pradesh. Passionate about deep reinforcement learning and seeking a company where I can utilize my organizational, creative, and project management skills to gain expertise on the companys brands, products and services.

projects.name: REAL - ESTATE Project
projects.description: Developed a Real Estate project using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) with Google Firebase for authentication. The application allows users to browse real estate listings, view detailed property images, and contact property owners directly through the platform. Integrated a robust image upload feature, enabling property owners to easily add and manage their listings. Implemented responsive UI/UX for optimal user experience on both desktop and mobile devices. The application also includes advanced search and filter functionalities to help users find properties that match their specific requirements, enhancing the overall usability and engagement of the platform.

projects.name: Library management system
projects.description: Implemented a robust backend using the MERN stack to track book availability and pricing, enabling the application to respond to 500+ queries per day without downtime, enhancing overall system reliability.

experiences.description: Specialized in enhancing drone security through work on lightweight ciphers as a research intern. Developed expertise in cryptographic algorithms. Implemented and optimized lightweight ciphers to fortify drone communication against potential threats. Strengthened problem-solving skills and adaptability. Gained hands-on experience in cybersecurity for unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs).

full_output.name: YERASI CHARATH KUMAR REDDY
